imdb.plot outline: Triangle Home TV was created to give the residents of North Carolina's growing research Triangle an informative, entertaining way to learn about local businesses. From home improvement & decor, to custom gardens and cooking classes, you can see it on Triangle Home TV. Get to know your local businesses as they show their unique products and services and share inside tips and tricks.
imdb.title: Triangle Home TV
plot: _Triangle Home TV_ (qv) was created to give the residents of North Carolina's growing research Triangle an informative, entertaining way to learn about local businesses.
